name: Love Conquers All
description:
It's just an IK demo as I had no time it turns out but thanks to Freya, rob1997, gameicons and whoever else I'm forgetting for letting me slop this together.

Joystick to move

or

WASD to run around

All project files are at https://github.com/MooseHat-Mux/Clashonte.git
